title.narrative: CHILD PROTECTION SYSTEM

description.narrative: By the end of 2019, a national and state-level special protection system exists to prevent, address and restore - in an integrated manner across sectors and branches of government - the rights of children and adolescents that have been violated, with special attention to those violations related to migration, institutionalization, violence - especially gender-based violence- and discrimination., which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Support the creation of a national integrated protection system

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, a national and state-level special protection system exists to prevent, address and restore - in anintegrated manner across sectors and branches of government - the rights of children and adolescents that have been violated, withspecial attention to those violations related to migration, institutionalization, violence - especially gender-based violence- anddiscrimination.

description.narrative: UNICEF Mexico focused on strengthening the child protection workforce to ensure a coordinated response to cases of violence and abuse. In the particular case of gender-based violence (GBV), UNICEF Mexico focused on violence prevention strategies and integrated response services as part of the Spotlight Initiative. To respond to the ongoing migrant crisis, UNICEF Mexico has pushed for the alternative care agenda in the country. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Existencia de una comision de proteccion especial en el marco del SIPINNA y de los Sistemas Locales.(45479)

baseline.value: No existe la comision de proteccion especial en el marco del SIPINNA.

target.value: 2019:En 2018 existe una comision a de proteccion especial en el SIPINNA y en los Sistemas de los 32 Sistemas Locales.

actual.value: 2020:Continua la Comision de proteccion especial en el marco del SIPINNA a nivel nacional (Creada en 2016) En 2019 funcionan 6 comisiones de proteccion especial en los SIPINNAS Estatales Continuan trabajando las comisiones de proteccion especial de Ch

title.narrative: Un sistema de referencias y de responsabilidades profesionales es establecido, con sensibilidad de genero, en respuesta a la violencia, el abuso, explotacion y negligencia contra ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes en todos los sectores en contacto con la infancia y la adolescencia.(63514)

target.value: 2019:Sistema de referencias y responsabilidades profesionales establecido mediante protocolos de procedimientos, con sensibilidad de genero, en respuesta a la violencia, el abuso, explotacion y negligencia

actual.value: 2020:Estan en funcionamiento las 32 Procuradurias Estatales y la Procuraduria Federal de Proteccion y 1016 Procuradurias Municipales, Delegaciones Municipales y Subprocuradurias.
